definitions.definition: A man, generally a younger man.
definitions.example: So we were at the mall and these two dudes just walk up to us and say "hi".

definitions.definition: (used in the vocative) A term of address for someone, typically a man, particularly when cautioning him or offering him advice.
definitions.example: Dude, I'd be careful around the principal; he's having a bad day.

definitions.definition: A man who is very concerned about his dress and appearance; a dandy, a fop.
To take a vacation in a dude ranch.
Usually followed by up: to dress up, to wear smart or special clothes.
